name: Semicontrol
description:
A simple puzzle game where you try to put the disc on the right in the red square by moving the disc on the left. Green squares reverses the movement relationship.

This game is a prototype. But the response I got for it was positive, so I decided to work on it more. Currently there are 22 levels in the game.

Semicontrol is open source. If you want to see the source, download semicontrol.love, rename it to semicontrol.zip and unzip it. A LÖVE file is actually a renamed zip archive.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys (On Android swipe to the desired direction and release, wasd if you have an external keyboard.)

Fullscreen: F11

Refresh level: F5

Return to menu/Quit: Escape

Start game: Space

Music on/off: M

Sound on/off: F

Win32 and Win64 files come with the required binaries. If you run Linux, you need to install LÖVE (love2d). On Android you can install the apk, or you can install LÖVE for Android from Google Play and run the love file with it. I CAN upload Mac OS X binaries, but I don't have a Mac, so I can't test them.
